headline.main: FOUR DAYS LATER FROM EUROPE.; ARRIVAL OF THE WASHINGTON. MARKETS ALL FIRM. State of Politics in England and France. ENGLAND. The Budget. The Arctic Searching Expedition. The Yacht America--A Challenge. IRELAND. FRANCE. SPAIN. GERMANY. AUSTRIA. BELGIUM. ITALY. PERSIA. COMMERCIAL INTELLIGENCE.

docs.lead_paragraph: The U. S. Mail steamship Washington, E. M. FITCH, Commander, arrived at this port yesterday morniing. She left Bremen on the 8th Inst., and after encounter.ng a terrific gale of wind in the North sea, she reached Southampton on the 10th, whence, after receiving the British and French mails and passengers, she finally departed at 4P. M. on the 13th inst.

headline.main: An Incident in the Life of Scott.

docs.lead_paragraph: BY A LATE FERGEANT MAJOR, 4TH U. S. ARTILLERY. From the Newark Daily Advertiser. The summer of '32 was eventtul to the soldiers of the Military School at Old Point, Va. Nearly the whole of that large garrison was ordered to the Western frontier. then suffering the barbarities of Indian warfare under tine notorious BLACK HAWK. headline.main: FROM MARSHFIELD.; Preparations for Mr. Webster's Funeral-Appearance of the Body--Funeral Arrangements-Incidents of his Death. &c. &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: I write from the shades of Marshfield, late the cherished home of DANIEL WEBSTER, and near where now repose his mortal remains, awaiting conveyance to their final resting place. This seems a hallowed presence. All of the departed statesman that was ever visible to the eye, lies motionless before us; and when we remember the master-spirit that was ever associated with it in life;

byline.original: Special Correspondence of the New-York Daily Times

docs.lead_paragraph: HEALTH OF SAVANNAH.--We have the satisfaction of announcing that since the last weekly report, there has been a marked improvement in the health of this city. We derive this information from sources which may be relied upon--such as the testimony of several physicians in good practice, the number of whose patients has materially decreased, from druggists who have noticed a corresponding falling off in the number of prescriptions called for, and from others.

docs.lead_paragraph: In the superior Court at Baltimore, JOHN H.B. LATROBE, Esq., arose and made a motion to adjourn, which he accompanied with the following eloquent tribute of respect to the memory of the illustrious dead:

docs.lead_paragraph: REMINISCENCES OF MR. WEBSTER.--The Washington correspondent of the Baltimore Sun gives the following anecdotes of Mr. WEBSTER: It will be recollected that Mr. WEBSTER's continuance in Mr. TYLER'S Cabinet caused considerable shyness on part of many of his old political associates towards him. After a brief period. the illustrious Statesman concluded the celebrated treaty with England.

headline.main: THE SOUTH-WEST.; Cuba-Quarantine--Politics--Rappings--The Season--The McDonough Estate, &c., &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: The telegraphic news to-day from your City announces the arrival of the Black Warrior from Havana, and that a Spanish war-steamer had been ordered off the Moro to prevent the entrance of the Crescent City.
docs.snippet: The telegraphic news to-day from your City announces the arrival of the Black Warrior from Havana, and that a Spanish war-steamer had been ordered off the Moro to prevent the entrance of the Crescent City.

docs.lead_paragraph: ENTHUSIASTIC WHIG MEETING IN THE FIFTH CONGRESSIONAL DISTRICT.--The Whigs of the Thirteenth Ward had a large and very enthusiastic meeting in Grand street, for the purpose of ratifying the nomination of JOSEPH HOXIE for Congress, ROBERT H. RICHARDSON for Assembly, WM. H. WRIGHT for Assistant-Alderman, and the other Charter nominations.
